description: The Division of Criminal Justice Services (DCJS) collects information regarding Probationers Under Supervision from New York City Probation and the 57 county probation departments outside New York City.  This datasets shows the number of probationers, by county, by conviction category and by type of offense.

metadata.attribution: New York State Division of Criminal Justice Services

name: Probationers Under Supervision:  Beginning 2006
